concept.title: Draw 2D Isometric Views
concept.shortdesc: With Isometric Snap, you can create 2D objects that appear to be 3D solids.

conbody.p: By setting Isometric Snap on the Draft Settings dialog boxand turning on Snap and Grid, you can easily align objects along one of three isometric planes. However, although the isometric drawing looks like 3D, it is actually a 2D representation. Therefore, you cannot extract distance and areas, display objects from different viewports, or delete hidden lines automatically.
